channel.title: Froyoscape Banner + Logo Request
channel.description:
All thanks if you do, and if you do, you may get a Graphics Designer rank in-game. Nothing special, just a symbol.
As for the logo and banner: [b]Logo:[/b] My server's abbreviation is either Froyo or FS. Fit to your needs. Color: Make it dark blue and the text light blue.
[b]Banner:[/b] My server's subtitle is A taste of Frogurt. Keep that in mind while you design :P. Color: Any color that comes to your mind when you say Froyo (or FroyoScape).
I would like simplicity in the logo and banner, not a grungy type.
Thank you, Arham, Founder of FroyoScape

item.title: Froyoscape Banner + Logo Request
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

All thanks if you do, and if you do, you may get a Graphics Designer rank in-game. Nothing special, just a symbol.

As for the logo and banner:
Logo:
My server’s abbreviation is either Froyo or FS. Fit to your needs.
Color: Make it dark blue and the text light blue.

Banner:
My server’s subtitle is A taste of Frogurt. Keep that in mind while you design :P.
Color: Any color that comes to your mind when you say Froyo (or FroyoScape).

I would like simplicity in the logo and banner, not a grungy type.

Thank you,
Arham,
Founder of FroyoScape
